/Users/fpy/Coding/trex2/trex/domain/EnumDomain.hh

XML parsing constructor

Parameters:
node an XML node

Create a new domain based on the content of node. The type of EnumDomain is enum.

A full domain is defined by the empty element : 

 <enum/>

A enum containing the two values "foo" and "bar" is described by 

 <enum>
   <elem value="foo"/>
   <elem value="bar"/>
 </enum>
       *
